reviews.review_text: What a great company! So professional and the products are truly amazing! The chicken stuffed with broccoli & cheese was a hit with the family and so was the crispy cauliflower! I would recommend this company as a fundraiser and I ll be ordering again for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks very much!  We are honoured to be able help so many schools and teams. Glad you liked our products.
